abstract:
Ah, good old FAQs: the internet’s native documentation format. In this
talk, we’ll explore various questions we might frequently ask ourselves
about FAQs, such as:

-  Why do readers always seem to want them even though they’re routinely
   out of date?
-  Why do some readers ignore our carefully crafted pages and use these
   giant walls of text as a starting point instead?
-  What are some strategies for keeping FAQs up to date?
-  What’s the #1 thing FAQs do RIGHT?
-  How can we make FAQs more user-friendly?
-  Do we even actually need FAQs?

(Caution: May contain opinions.)
title: The Facts About FAQs
